replies.author: myka
replies.txt_content:
你的ValidityPeriod插件该更新了
链接:http://pan.baidu.com/s/1miD6YHq 密码:mxsb

replies.author: hami_melon
replies.txt_content: 可以升级一下插件和下载一些优化服务器的插件，http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-491106-1-1.html，望采纳
